description:
Learn the skill sets, tricks, tips and tools to succeed faster than the average person to achieve six figure incomes!

Questions -

1. Have you lost your time freedom?

2. Are you struggling to make your income meet your needs?

3. Would you like work when you want, where you want and enjoy your own personal time with extra income left over?

Each of the sections, lectures and chapters is designed for any and all people looking to make a positive change in their life. They are stand alone chapters, meaning you can jump around or follow straight through.

Some best practices are to watch, listen, read each lecture and then implement them over the course of one week. There is enough material and training for a plethora of learning objectives.

This course is all encompassing for the three types of learners.

How does that work you might ask?

1. Visual - High Quality Videos of Course Material that give any visual learner access to learning at their best medium.

2. Auditory - Top Level Audio Recordings for those that are very cognitive in their learning or need to have course materials on the go.

3. Kinesthetic - Professionally written and edited book of chapters that allow those that need to feel their way, cognitively, through the lectures for success.

How is the Course Broken Down?

Each training concept is broken down into sections for easy learning. Each section includes the a video, audio and written version of the training material. (no other Udemy Course is this extensive).

Section 1:

Meet Lisa - Course Teaser

Section 2:

Free Intros - Free lectures for you to see, hear and read/feel how professional this course is.

Section 3-23: (sections 19-23 currently being created)

Video - These lectures are visual narrations, bursts of energy and to the point learning objectives that support the audio and written transcript sections.

Audio - Each of these lectures is a professional audio recording of the written transcript chapter. Take the guide mobile as you can listen and learn as many times as you need for success.

Written Transcript - Informative written chapters from the published book that inspired thousands. Share The Success Code. Get deep insight and clear cut paths to your first/next six figures of income.

Section 24:

Wrap Up - Next Steps - Summary and clear next steps to continue your success path. Access to specially created tools for course enrollees to use for prospecting and team building.

Section 25:

Take The Quiz! - A quick and easy 10 question quiz with information that may just surprise you.

Ready - Set - Success!

This is the most comprehensively designed course on the systems to six figures and how to make your first/next six figures in a timely manner.

Join Kenyon Salo who is a top trainer in his profession. With over 10,000 hours of training, world wide travel, great video, audio and stage presence and easy to learn systems you will learn the easy 1-2-3 steps to making your first/next six figures.

By joining this course you will also have the opportunity to work *one-on-one with him. There is no other trainer on Udemy who is willing to make this happen. Your success is Kenyon's number one desire.

*One-on-one training is reserved for those that apply and are accepted to join Kenyon's team in his company. Contact him directly to discuss. kenyonsalo@gmail.com
title: Network Marketing Six Figure Secrets Revealed
